m_szDocTitle: Here's What to Expect When Tesla (TSLA) Reports Earnings This Afternoon - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet Here's What to Expect When Tesla (TSLA) Reports Earnings This Afternoon By Kurumi Fukushima | 05/06/15 - 11:51 AM EDT Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Shares of Tesla Motors Inc ( TSLA - Get Report ) are lower by 0.64% to $231.46 in midday trading Wednesday, ahead of the electric car maker's first quarter earnings results after the market closes today. Analysts expect the company to post a loss of 50 cents per share on revenue of $1.04 billion for the period, according to analysts surveyed by Thomson Reuters.
